level.heading: Validity of condemnations or closings pursuant to repealed law not affected.
level.text: The validity of any condemnation proceeding or any street or alley closing pursuant to any section of law repealed by this act shall not be affected by its repeal.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 4-201
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 9-201.01.

level.heading: References in text
level.text: “This act,” referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 4-201.
